mission: Marvel Comics: SMOKE PANEL! Golda emerges, cigarette glowing with power! Speech bubble: 'I'm the only MAN in the cabinet!' TRANSFORMATION: Cabinet members become kindergarteners! Action panels: YOM KIPPUR WAR! Coffee pot in one hand, tank radio in other! KABOOM! SNAP! Intelligence failure panel - files scatter! TIME REWIND PANELS showing ignored warnings. Kitchen diplomacy: World leaders SHRINK in her presence! Resignation panel: Mushroom cloud of smoke. Final panel: 'There's no Palestine' - Internet EXPLODES in background! POW!

input.original_mission: Marvel Comics: SMOKE PANEL! Golda emerges, cigarette glowing with power! Speech bubble: 'I'm the only MAN in the cabinet!' TRANSFORMATION: Cabinet members become kindergarteners! Action panels: YOM KIPPUR WAR! Coffee pot in one hand, tank radio in other! KABOOM! SNAP! Intelligence failure panel - files scatter! input.hook: Golda. The only MAN in the cabinet.

output.optimized_script: SMOKE PANEL! Golda emerges, a cigarette glowing fiercely.  She commands, her voice gravelly: "I am the only man in the cabinet!" TRANSFORMATION! Cabinet members shrink to toddlers, their debates childish cries. Action explodes: Yom Kippur War! Coffee pot in one hand, tank radio in the other. KABOOM! SNAP! Intelligence failure! Crucial files scatter; warnings ignored. TIME REWIND: Ignored warnings flash. Kitchen diplomacy begins. World leaders shrink before her. Resignation! A mushroom cloud billows.  The internet ignites. "There is no Palestine!" POW! Digital firestorm.

segments.text: SMOKE PANEL! Golda emerges, a cigarette glowing fiercely.
She commands, her voice gravelly: "I am the only man in the cabinet!"
TRANSFORMATION! Cabinet members shrink to toddlers, their debates childish cries.
Action explodes: Yom Kippur War! Coffee pot in one hand, tank radio in the other.
KABOOM! SNAP! Intelligence failure! Crucial files scatter; warnings ignored.
"There is no Palestine!" POW! Digital firestorm.

visual_style.reasoning: The description explicitly references 'Marvel Comics', 'speech bubble', 'action panels', 'KABOOM! SNAP!', and 'POW!', all hallmarks of the comic book style. The narrative also lends itself to dynamic, bold visuals that a comic style excels at. A vibrant color palette will enhance the action and dramatic impact, fitting for the specified 'power' and 'EXPLODES' elements. This style is highly engaging for a general audience on Instagram.
